BusinessCase.description: ODD Aspects and Elements for ADS Safety Requiremens
BusinessCase.name: ODD Aspects and Elements

Property.statement: ODD shall be able to capture the safety requirements.
Fedarates shall communicate with sensor and other fedarates usingHLA Bus
Autonomous Vehicles shall be reliable (no unacceptable variation in function)
Autonomous Vehicles shall be safe. (no unacceptable risk)

UseCase.name: Safety Features for ODD

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns related to demarcations of topological, functional, organizational, or other forms of interactions.
CPS.name: Boundaries Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about enterprise, time to market, environment, regulation, cost, etc.
CPS.name: Business Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about function including communication among federates.
CPS.name: Communications Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns related to the ability to compute selected properties of a component assembly from the properties of its components.
CPS.name: Composition Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about function including sensing, actuation, control, communications, physicality, etc.
CPS.name: Functional Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about human interaction with and as part of a CPS.
CPS.name: Human Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about the lifecycle of CPS including its components.
CPS.name: Lifecycle Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about time and frequency, including the generation and transport of time and frequency signals, timestamping, managing latency, timing composability, etc.
CPS.name: Timing Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about trustworthiness of CPS including security, privacy, safety, reliability, and resilience.
CPS.name: Trustworthiness Aspects
